TopicTitle: Question about hiding Kerbal Engineer Redux tooltip

Articles.Content:
For this mod,

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/18230-1-0-2-Kerbal-Engineer-Redux-v1-0-16-6](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/18230-1-0-2-Kerbal-Engineer-Redux-v1-0-16-6)

and this tooltip,

[http://imgur.com/H7I8cVt](http://imgur.com/H7I8cVt)

How does one disable it?

Sorry, I don't have an answer for you.

I'm posting because I also would like to do this.

Settings->Build Engineer Overlay, disable VISIBLE

Although I find it useful...
